L. camara extracts are extremely toxic toward pests and exert a highly repellent effect on weevils in stored grains.
11 In rural areas in Ethiopia, farmers have been using these extracts as insecticides during grain storage to prevent infestations by weevils and other insect pests. L. camara leaf extracts also possess larvicidal activity, while oil extracts from the flowers have repellent activity against mosquitoes.
